text: And mandatory quarantine times, too - why all staff - & anybody else - isn't at least offered #Ivermectin, is beyond me - give people a choice, while they wait for the #CovidVaccine - and for God's Sake, #TreatEarly, let people take the drugs as a #preventative #Chloroquine #HCQ https://t.co/IxiVExnRrg https://t.co/0aY6K9nb5d
